metadata.title: RL78 Family product in which the frequency accuracy of the high-speed on-chip oscillator is high at high temperatures

sections.content:
Question:
Is there an RL78 Family product, in which the frequency accuracy of the high-speed on-chip oscillator is high at high temperatures as well? 
There are many conventional products with a frequency accuracy of ±5% or more at 105°C, but those products fail to establish UART communication at high temperatures.
Answer:
The M-version of RL78/G15 and RL78/I1A has a frequency accuracy of ±2% at temperatures ranging between -40 to +125°C with a voltage ranging between 2.4 to 5.5 V. 
Moreover, a frequency accuracy of ±1% is achieved at temperatures ranging between -20 to +85°C with a voltage ranging between 2.4 to 5.5 V.
RL78/G15 is the general purpose product. RL78/I1A is ASSP for lighting and power source.
Suitable Products
RL78/G15
